item.title: Resident Evil - Video Game
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

nolan2131:

What system did you prefer to play on throughout the series?

EDIT: Missread the question lol, but the series is so big and there’s games for all consoles and some games are for specific consoles only, so it’s kind of impossible to tell.

Remake: GC/PC(only if u don’t have GC/Wii)
Zero: GC(only if u don’t have GC/Wii)
RE1: PS1-3
RE2: GC/PS1-3(only if u don’t have GC/Wii)
RE3: GC/PS1-3(only if u don’t have GC/Wii)
RE4: PS3
RE5: PS3

Read full topic

item.title: Resident Evil - Video Game
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

It’s not a debate between the Las Plagas thingies and zombies, it’s about the actual gameplay. I wouldn’t mind RE4 with the classic gameplay, it would be quite fun.

Oh and the Resident Evil 4’s plot/storyline kinda went off the road a lot.

And:

EDIT: You forgot shitloads of games. Resident Evil Remake, Resident Evil Zero, Resident Evil Outbreak 1 & 2, Resident Evil Code Veronica etc, Could you edit the poll or something? Add all the games so we get accurate results, but I'm pretty sure RE4 will win cuz of newfags.
Oh and my personal favourite atm is Remake or RE2. I gotta play through zero now that I got the emulator working well.

Read full topic

item.title: Resident Evil - Video Game
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

I understand the debate between the parasitic side and the zombie side, it’s just Resident Evil 4’s content was awesome in my opinion. Mercenaries, Separate Ways, etc… I was not the biggest re5 fan, but Leon is my favorite character to appear in Resident Evil so I’m looking forward to 6. Also I played Code Veronica etc… Along with all the Resident Evil’s. Does not make me a newfag, just someone who played the series and had a favorite.

Read full topic

item.title: Resident Evil - Video Game
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

I made this thread in RSC Section because I’m more of a oldschooler and into the classic type of games, and I thought that there’s more people there that are like me : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,539620.0.html

Sorry, but I have to call you a newfag for liking the new shooter type that ruined the series.

EDIT: You forgot shitloads of games. Resident Evil Remake, Resident Evil Zero, Resident Evil Outbreak 1 & 2, Resident Evil Code Veronica etc, Could you edit the poll or something? Add all the games so we get accurate results, but I’m pretty sure RE4 will win cuz of newfags.

EDIT: Now after like 5 edits I’m done with this post. lol.

Read full topic
